alert.note: Alert for Pike; Southern Wayne (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 6:01PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Wayne and Pike Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 600 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Skytop, or 11 miles northeast of Mount Pocono, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blooming Grove, Paupack, Greentown, Ledgerdale, Greeley, Pecks Pond, Dingmans Ferry, Angels, Panther and Twin Lakes. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 84 between 20 and 34. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
